title: Topic 001 Question 067
body: You built an application on Google Cloud that uses Cloud Spanner. Your support team needs to monitor the environment but should not have access to table data.
You need a streamlined solution to grant the correct permissions to your support team, and you want to follow Google-recommended practices. What should you do?
options: Add the support team group to the roles/monitoring.viewer role
Add the support team group to the roles/spanner.databaseUser role.
Add the support team group to the roles/spanner.databaseReader role.
Add the support team group to the roles/stackdriver.accounts.viewer role.
